snippet: Rising unrest in the Arab world will dominate this week's Sunday shows, with each broadcast focusing almost exclusively on diplomacy and the fallout from the attack that killed four Americans at the U.S. Consulate in Benghazi, Libya.
abstract: Rising unrest in the Arab world will dominate this week's Sunday shows, with each broadcast focusing almost exclusively on diplomacy and the fallout from the attack that killed four Americans at the U.S. Consulate in Benghazi, Libya.
